problem.markdown:
>>Which statement is NOT true about Two-Card Kanban?<< ( ) When the previous operation or downtime of the downstream machine is complete and it is not blocked, the downstream machine takes a part from input WIP buffer. ( ) When there is a long distance between operations to work cells, or when parts are delivered to the machines in different-sized batches, a two-card kanban system will be used. ( X ) If the withdrawal kanban buffer is not empty, the priority is to take care of the existing production-ordering kanban of the part in the output WIP buffer of the upstream machine. Then the withdrawal kanban is attached to the next part. ( ) On the upstream side, there is a limited number of production ordering kanbans. When a part arrives in, and there is at least one production-ordering kanban, the part gets operation and a kanban is attached.
[explanation] If the withdrawal kanban buffer is not empty, the production-ordering kanban is removed from a part in the output WIP buffer of the upstream machine and moved to the production-ordering kanban buffer. A withdrawal kanban is attached to that part. [explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.label: Which statement is NOT true about Two-Card Kanban?

choicegroup.choice: When the previous operation or downtime of the downstream machine is complete and it is not blocked, the downstream machine takes a part from input WIP buffer.
When there is a long distance between operations to work cells, or when parts are delivered to the machines in different-sized batches, a two-card kanban system will be used.

If the withdrawal kanban buffer is not empty, the priority is to take care of the existing production-ordering kanban of the part in the output WIP buffer of the upstream machine. Then the withdrawal kanban is attached to the next part.

On the upstream side, there is a limited number of production ordering kanbans. When a part arrives in, and there is at least one production-ordering kanban, the part gets operation and a kanban is attached.

div.p: If the withdrawal kanban buffer is not empty, the production-ordering kanban is removed from a part in the output WIP buffer of the upstream machine and moved to the production-ordering kanban buffer. A withdrawal kanban is attached to that part.
